title: Putting names to faces
author: VD
content_html: And breasts, apparently. Anyhow, the Pan-Galactic one has his harem up again. I knew “Renee” was a bit of a nut, but I had no idea that she was married to Tom Cruise, the little Scientologicial minx.
content_text:
And breasts, apparently.  Anyhow, the Pan-Galactic one
has his harem up again
.  I knew “Renee” was a bit of a nut, but I had no idea that she was married to Tom Cruise, the little Scientologicial minx.
